quotes.author: David Allen
quotes.quote: You can do anything, but not everything..

quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry
quotes.quote: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.

quotes.author: Unknown Author
quotes.quote: The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least..

quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky
quotes.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take.

quotes.author: Ambrose Redmoon
quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.

quotes.author: Gandhi
quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world..

quotes.author: Lin-Chi
quotes.quote: When hungry, eat your rice; when tired, close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me, but wise men will know what I mean.

quotes.author: A. A. Milne
quotes.quote: The third-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the majority. The second-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the minority. The first-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking.
